name: A Jungle Warfare (17+) - Sniper Games For Free
name_original: A Jungle Warfare (17+) - Sniper Games For Free
description:
** INTENSE FPS SNIPER GAME! **
** INCREDIBLE 3D GRAPHICS! **

Get ready for the most intense FPS combat game you've ever played. In a remote jungle all alone, its just you and your sniper rifle against an army of "bad guys" on a mission to take you out. Will you survive the night?

- Multiple backgrounds/environments.
- Simple "one tap" controls!
- Realistic 3D graphics.
- Instense soundtrack.
- Head shots, lots of blood, and more!

** WARNING! - THIS GAME CONTAINS EXCESSIVE VIOLENCE AND IS NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN. YOU MUST BE 17+ TO DOWNLOAD THIS APP.
